attributes.action: The All In It Together Parliamentary Bar Closure e-petition
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned in the spirit of togetherness petition that the government legislate in the interests of preventing social disorder and injustice, health and safety in the workplace and fairness to all in these times of national austerity the banning of the sale and/or the consumption of all alcoholic beverages with-in the present day boundaries of the Palace of Westminster.
